item.title: Save the Cell Phone, Save the World
item.description:
Cell phones are frequently overlooked as a source of environmental concern, valuable resources, and potential income. While seemingly harmless, these devices contain toxic materials and represent a significant waste problem due to their short lifespans and frequent replacement. A cell phone’s small size and durable exterior might make it seem environmentally benign, but the internal components tell a different story. Lead, cadmium, arsenic, mercury, plastics, and glass are all found within these devices...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/save-the-cell-phone-save-the-world/
